thread.title: UCLA Football Player Arrested for Sexual Assault
thread.title_full: UCLA Football Player Arrested for Sexual Assault

author: Kelly Terez
title: UCLA Football Player Arrested for Sexual Assault
text:
Christian Petersen/Getty Images (LOS ANGELES) -- A member of UCLA's football team has been arrested for sexual assault. 
Los Angeles police arrested UCLA walk-on punter Adam Searl on Thursday after suspicions of rape. 
"We have been informed of the situation involving Adam Searl, and we take these accusations very seriously," said UCLA head football coach Jim Mora in a statement. "Adam has been suspended from the team indefinitely while the legal process runs its course. Due to the ongoing police investigation, we are unable to discuss this matter further at this time." 
According to a statement from the LAPD, a victim reported the rape in October 2014, and she recently identified the 20-year-old football player as a suspect. 
Police said Searl was booked on three counts of rape, but has since been released on bail.
